word:
North, South, East, and West.--Why has it not been understood from the Word of God that the work being done in medical missionary lines is a fulfillment 
                                                                           122
of the scripture, "Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city, and bring in hither the poor, and the maimed, and the halt, and the blind. And the servant said, Lord, it is done as thou hast commanded, and yet there is room. And the Lord said unto the servant, Go out into the highways and hedges, and compel them to come in, that my house may be full."
